department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: lozenge-shaped motifs with zodiac border; woman at center of each lozenge with baby tied to back; jars, stools, and other items overlapping light blue grid and x-pattern background; border at top and bottom with alternating jar design
markings: in gold, stamped logo: [C.F.A. / 6 Yards] and other seals in gold
title: Wax printed cloth with mother and child
